summary: Japan is an island country in East Asia, made up of thousands of islands, with a population of around 124 million. Its capital, Tokyo, is one of the world's largest cities. Japan's history spans thousands of years, from Upper Paleolithic settlements to the modern constitutional monarchy. The country has experienced periods of unity, feudalism, and isolation, and emerged as a global power after World War II. Known for its technology, culture, and unique traditions, Japan is a popular destination for tourists and a leader in various industries.
title: Japan
